Package pyamf :: Module amf3 :: Class ClassDefinition

Class ClassDefinition

source code

I contain meta relating to the class definition.

x.__init__(...) initializes x; see x.__class__.__doc__ for signature		 source code

_getClass(self)
If alias is None, an anonymous class is returned, otherwise the class is loaded externally.		 source code

getClassAlias(self)

source code 

Gets the class alias that is held by this definition.

Returns: ClassAlias
Class alias.

See Also: get_class_alias.

getStaticAttrs(self, obj, codec=None)

source code 

Returns a list of static attributes based on obj. Once built, this list is immutable.

Parameters:
  • obj (mixed.) - The object to determine the static attributes from.

Since: 0.4


Instance Variable Details [hide private]

alias

The alias to this class definition. If this value is None, or an empty string, the class is considered to be anonymous.
Type:
ClassAlias
